function.name: set_wakeup_timer
function.description: Set a timer to wake you up in a specified number of seconds in the future.  This allows taking actions in the future.  The wakeup message will appear with the user role but will look something like WAKEUP:<message>.  Multiple wakeup messages are supported

seconds.description: number of seconds in the future that the timer will wake you up

message.description: wakeup message that will be sent to you
